Posts.Content: Apr 23, 2012 04:47PM robin121 wrote: Wow.  You and I have very similar situations.  I was diagnosed 12/14/11.  Tumor was under a centimeter.  Had a lumpectomy and IORT (intraoperative radiation therapy).  Did you have IORT?  I had 25 radiation treatments and finished on April 17.  Did not need the boost since I had the IORT.  I have not experienced any itching (yet), but my skin is very sore.  My armpit hurts the most.  I also get sharp shooting pains acoss my breast and weird "shivering" pains.  Any of this sound familiar to you?  Have you asked your MD about the itching?  When did it develop?  It's been a week since I finished treatment and I am just wondering what else I can expect.  Are you taking/going to take Tamoxifen?  Ugh.
Posts.Title: 3 weeks out, deep itchy pain that's driving me crazy!! moonlight60 moonlight60
